logoFingerprint.notes: The large, multi-color graphic elements and the rose logos exhibit characteristics consistent with sublimation printing, where the dye permeates the fabric fibers, resulting in a smooth, flat surface with vibrant colors that are integrated into the material rather than sitting on top. The 'R' logo on the back shows clear stitch definition and raised texture indicative of embroidery. The horizontal stripes on the ribbing are also consistent with sublimation on the ribbed fabric, maintaining the flat, integrated color look of the rest of the design.
